name: Liepard
flavorText:
These Pokémon vanish and appear
unexpectedly. Many Trainers are drawn
to their beautiful form and fur.

previous.name: Purrloin
previous.flavorText:
They steal from people for fun, but their
victims can’t help but forgive them.
Their deceptively cute act is perfect.

next.name: Pansage
next.flavorText:
This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest.
Eating a leaf from its head whisks
weariness away as if by magic.
